name: Check eligibility of customer to order a Card Reader - Direct Channels records Customer has activated card but card not found in Gemalto

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

And I locate a customer using the following criteria:
| registrationNumber | type |
| 01010191 | Personal |

children.description: Locate by data: | registrationNumber | type | | 01010191 | Personal |

testSteps.description: And I have a valid customer token for customer "0100000934680601000"
And I authenticate the Customer "0100000934680601000" to authentication level 1 using a customer token

children.description: Update customer token with cust key: 0100000934680601000, KNOWN

testSteps.description: When I check the eligibility of customer "0100000934680601000" to order a Card Reader
Then I should receive back a successful response

And the following Customer Card Reader information should be returned
| eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered |
| false | Active | false | true | true | false | 19 |

children.description: Validate customer card reader info: | eligibleToOrder | pacStatus | customerCardReaderProfileLocked | hasNoActivatedCardAndNoEligibleDebitCardToUseWithCardReader | cardReaderCustomer | customerCardReaderProfileStatusActive | numberOfCardReadersOrdered | | false | Active | false | true | true | false | 19 |

testSteps.description:
And the following Non Eligible Debit Card details should be returned
| cardNumber | cardStatusNormal | cardRelationshipCertain |
| 00669514 | false | false |
| 00668936 | false | false |
| 05122915 | true | true |
| 00668907 | false | false |
| 00668947 | false | false |
| 00668992 | false | false |
| 00669002 | false | false |
| 00668906 | false | false |

children.description: Validate debit cards: | cardNumber | cardStatusNormal | cardRelationshipCertain | | 00669514 | false | false | | 00668936 | false | false | | 05122915 | true | true | | 00668907 | false | false | | 00668947 | false | false | | 00668992 | false | false | | 00669002 | false | false | | 00668906 | false | false |

testSteps.description:
And the following available Card Reader Devices should be returned
| cardReaderDescription | cardReaderCost |
| STANDARD | 550 |
| USABILITY | 550 |

children.description: Validate available card reader devices: | cardReaderDescription | cardReaderCost | | STANDARD | 550 | | USABILITY | 550 |

title: Check eligibility of customer to order a Card Reader - Direct Channels records Customer has activated card but card not found in Gemalto
